title: Optimizing AI Models for Educational Outcomes
abstract: This study explores optimization techniques for transformer-based models to improve learning analytics in online education platforms.

title: Blockchain for Public Health Records
abstract: This paper proposes a blockchain-based solution to enhance the security and accessibility of electronic health records for underserved populations.

title: Climate Modeling Using Generative AI
abstract: We demonstrate the use of generative AI in simulating regional climate projections and its implications for policy and urban planning.
